name: market for ventilation components factory | ventilation components factory | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/1840/documentation

This is a market activity. In the case of services or immobile infrastructures, markets are connecting suppliers and consumers at a global level. For specific connections at regional level, direct links between the local producing activities and the local consumers are preferred. Transport or losses are logically not relevant for this type of products.;This is the market for  'ventilation components factory', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;This is an immobile infrastructure, representing the construction of ventilation components factory. The infrastructure is based on an approximation of an company producing metal parts and components for ventilation systems. It has a yearly production of 5,000 tons, the life time of buildings is assumed to be 50 years and the lifetime of the production machines is assumed to be 25 years. The process includes building, machinery, their decommission and land use.

This activity starts with the built infrastructure ready to use.

This activity ends with the infrastructure made accessible to the users. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
